title: Caregiver No Experience Required
location: 215 S Vermont Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90004
description:
Caregiver
Pay: $17.00 – $21.00 per hour
Location: Orange County, CA
Job Type: Full-time, Part-time

Make a Difference Every Day
Amada Senior Care is seeking compassionate and dependable caregivers to support seniors in their homes. If you’re passionate about improving lives and providing exceptional care, we’d love to meet you

What We Offer:

Competitive Pay: $17–$21 per hour
Daily Pay Option: Available through Tapcheck
$200 Requirement Reimbursement*
$150 Employee Referral Bonus
Flexible Scheduling: Full-time, part-time, and weekend shifts
Comprehensive Benefits for full-time employees:
Free HMO Medical Plan
Dental and Vision Insurance
Cal Savers Retirement Plan
Paid Training: Includes hands-on training, shadowing, and orientation
Free Scrubs and PPE Provided
24/7 Support: Access to schedules and care plans online
Employee Appreciation Programs
Responsibilities and Requirements:

Provide companionship and assist with daily living activities (dressing, grooming, toileting, ambulation, turning, repositioning)
Must have Valid driver’s license, personal vehicle, and car insurance. This will disqualify you if you do not have this.
Prepare meals and support with light housekeeping (laundry, kitchen cleanup)
Offer medication reminders
Ensure client safety and report any changes or concerns to the care team
Maintain a supportive, professional relationship with clients and their families
*

Who We’re Looking For:

Caring and patient individuals who are dependable and trustworthy
Passionate about supporting seniors and making a positive impact
Observant and proactive in maintaining a safe environment
Join a team that values your work and supports your growth.
Check out our 5-star reviews to see why caregivers love working with Amada Senior Care. Amada Senior Care is an Equal Opportunity Employer and complies with all applicable civil rights laws.

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Pay: $17.00 - $21.00 per hour

Benefits:

Dental insurance
Employee assistance program
Flexible schedule
Health insurance
Life insurance
Professional development assistance
Referral program
Retirement plan
Vision insurance
Work Location: In person

title: Carwash/Detailer
location: 2700 Main St, Irvine, CA 92614, United States
description:
Responsibilities:

Perform thorough and efficient detailing and cleaning, including interior and exterior cleaning, vacuuming, and window cleaning.

Utilize appropriate cleaning products, tools, and equipment to ensure excellent results.

Follow established processes and procedures to ensure consistency and high-quality standards.

Assist clients with their specific requirements, answer their questions, and provide exceptional customer service.

Ensure the work area is clean, organized, and free from hazards at all times.

Adhere to safety protocols and guidelines to minimize accidents and maintain a safe working environment.

Keep up-to-date with industry trends, techniques, and best practices to continuously enhance your skills and deliver outstanding service.

Requirements

Previous experience in carwash and detailing is preferred, but we are willing to train the right candidate.

Excellent attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.

Strong manual dexterity and physical stamina to perform repetitive tasks and work in various weather conditions.

Basic knowledge of car washing and detailing techniques, tools, and products.

Exceptional customer service skills with a friendly and professional demeanor.

Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively with team members.

Reliable and punctual with a strong work ethic.

title: Caregiver
description:
We are seeking a compassionate and dependable Caregiver to support clients with daily living needs in a safe and respectful manner.

Full-time or Part-time

Responsibilities include:

Assisting with personal care such as bathing, dressing, grooming, and mobility

Preparing meals, light housekeeping, and providing companionship

Caregivers must be patient, attentive, and able to follow care plans while reporting any changes in client condition.
